name: WooCommerce Estimate and Quote – Live Product Cost Estimation and Quotation system for WordPress
author: TheInnovs

sections.description:
This plugin will provide your users to create products Estimates, ask for Quote, Convert the Estimates to Cart, Print or Email them! These features will help you to supercharge your WooCommerce store and bring more leads!

ðŸ‘‰ Core Features
* Create Products Estimate & ask for Quote
* Edit Estimates & Quotes
* Delete Estimates & Quote
* View Estimates list
* View Quotes list
* Settings from Admin Panel
* Export as PDF & CSV file
* Clone Estimates
* Convert Estimates to Cart
* Print or Send via Email

ðŸ‘‰ Docs Link: Documentation

ðŸ‘‰ Feature Suggestion/Issue Track: Google Forms |OR| GitHub

  • How to use
    Simply search for wc estimate and quote and install and activate it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder after extracting it to the “/wp-content/plugins/(the folder of the extracted plugin)” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this free?

Yes, this is free!

Can I ask or request for new feature?

Yes, you can! Request here-
Google Forms
GitHub
sections.changelog:
1.0.2.5

  • [Fix] Compatibility with WP 6.4.3
    *[Fix] PDF generation issue

1.0.2.4

  • [Fix] Compatibility with WP 6.0

1.0.2.3

  • [Fix] Compatibility with WP 5.9

1.0.2.3

  • [Fix] Update default options in Settings
  • [Fix] Woocommerce dependency
  • [Fix] Footer text change functionality
  • [Fix] Email Issue
  • [Fix] PDF Generate

1.0.2.2

  • [Fix] Incompability with WC because of old bootstrap version

1.0.2.1

  • [Fix] CSS override issue on several pages
  • [Fix] Compatibility fixes with the latest WP

1.0.2

  • [Fix] (https://github.com/theinnovs/wc-estimate-and-quote/issues/1)
  • [Fix] CSS override issue on plugins page

1.0.1

  • [Fix] Compatibility with latest WP and WooCommerce
  • [Feature] UI Improvement

1.0

  • Initial Release
